about_the_game:
Finnish Pub simulator is a pub simulator where you run your very own pub in the Finnish countryside. It's 1990 and you've finally achieved your dream of opening up your very own pub! Now comes the hard part of making your new pub successful.

Solo or Co-op

You can either be the sole owner of your pub or get the group together and have up to 8 players in your pub at once. Are you hard working are you going to spread the jobs evenly across everyone?

Manage Your Pub

Give your pub your own unique layout. You decide where the seating booths, appliances, and stock all go. Optimize your layout for both your customers and yourself.

Manage Your Inventory

Make sure you keep on top of your pubs inventory of bottles, cans, kegs and more. You decide how much each item costs. Maximize your profits as much as possible but don't go too far or you'll end up with disgruntled customers!

Serve Your Customers

If you don't keep on top of things you'll have a line up out the door and no one likes a long queue. Stay on top of orders coming in at the bar and make sure you don't leave your customers hanging. Wait, is that guy over his limit? Do we need to cut him off?

Each customer has their own unique traits that will affect what they order, how much they order, how often they order, and what their alcohol limit is!

Keep Your Pub Clean

Customers don't like it when tables are full of empty glasses another customer has left behind, make sure you keep on top of your janitorial tasks too.

Expand Your Pub's Offerings

The more tasks your carry out, the more you'll be rewarded. All that hard work you put in will pay off in the form of being able to upgrade your appliances, extend your open hours, and expand your drinks menu.

Date and Time Progression

Not only will time pass while your pub is open, the date will too. The day of the week will have an affect on the number of customers through your doors each night. Make sure it's all hands on deck for the weekend!

  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965 or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
